## goup-util utm task

Execute a Taskfile task in the VM

### Synopsis

Execute a Taskfile task in the VM.

This is a convenience wrapper around 'task <taskname>'.

Examples:
  goup-util utm task "Windows 11" build:hybrid:windows
  goup-util utm task "Windows 11" test:all

```
goup-util utm task <vm-name> <task-name> [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for task
```

* [goup-util utm](goup-util_utm.md)	 - Control UTM virtual machines
